snippet.title: Sacre Bleu - Official Overview Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Get a deep dive into Sacre Bleu in this new trailer for the bullet-time action-platformer game. Learn more about combat, gameplay, speedrunning, game-modifiers, and more in this Sacre Bleu trailer. Hack n’ slash your way out of la Bastille, blasting yourself through the air in graceful bullet-time aerial battles on a quest to save all of France! Sacre Bleu will be available on Steam and Nintendo Switch.
